org.apache.hama.bsp.sync

Class ZKSyncClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.bsp.sync.ZKSyncClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SyncClient, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ZKSyncBSPMasterClient, ZooKeeperSyncClientImpl

    public abstract class ZKSyncClient
extends Object
implements SyncClient, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher
    A Zookeeper based BSP distributed synchronization client that provides primitive synchronization API's

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher

      • getNodeName

        protected String getNodeName(TaskAttemptID taskId,
                 long superstep)
        Returns the Node name using conventions to address a superstep progress for task
        Parameters:
        taskId - The Task ID
        superstep - The superstep number
        Returns:
        String that represents the Zookeeper node path that could be created.

      • isExists

        protected boolean isExists(String path,
               org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher watcher)
                    throws org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException,
                           InterruptedException
        Check if the zookeeper node exists.
        Parameters:
        path - The Zookeeper node path to check.
        watcher - A Watcher that would trigger interested events on the node. This value could be null if no watcher has to be left.
        Returns:
        true if the node exists.
        Throws:
        org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException
        InterruptedException

        Parameters:

        protected byte[] getBytesForData(org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable value)
        Utility function to get byte array out of Writable
        Parameters:
        value - The Writable object to be converted to byte array.
        Returns:

      • extractData

        protected boolean extractData(String path,
                  org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable valueHolder)
        Read value stored in the Zookeeper node.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the Zookeeper node.
        valueHolder - The expected class type of the Writable object.
        Returns:
        The Writable object constructed from the value read from the Zookeeper node.

      • writeNode

        protected boolean writeNode(String path,
                org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable value,
                boolean persistent,
                org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher watcher)
        Writes data into the Zookeeper node. If the path does not exist the zookeeper node is created recursively and the value is stored in the node.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the Zookeeper node.
        value - The value to be stored in the Zookeeper node.
        persistent - true if the node to be created is ephemeral of permanent
        watcher - If any Watcher object should listen to event on the Zookeeper node.
        Returns:
        true if operation is successful.

      • constructKey

        public String constructKey(BSPJobID jobId,
                  String... args)
        Description copied from interface: SyncClient
        Construct key in the format required by the SyncClient for storing and retrieving information. This function is recommended to use to construct keys for storing keys.
        Specified by:
        constructKey in interface SyncClient
        Parameters:
        jobId - The BSP Job Id.
        args - The list of String objects that would be used to construct key
        Returns:
        The key consisting of entities provided in the required format.

      • storeInformation

        public boolean storeInformation(String key,
                       org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable value,
                       boolean permanent,
                       SyncEventListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: SyncClient
        Stores value for the specified key.
        Specified by:
        storeInformation in interface SyncClient
        Parameters:
        key - The key for which value should be stored. It is recommended to use constructKey to create key object.
        value - The value to be stored.
        permanent - true if the value should be persisted after end of session.
        listener - object that provides asynchronous updates on the state of information stored under the key.
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful.

      • getInformation

        public boolean getInformation(String key,
                     org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable valueHolder)
        Description copied from interface: SyncClient
        Retrieve value previously store for the key.
        Specified by:
        getInformation in interface SyncClient
        Parameters:
        key - The key for which value was stored.
        valueHolder - The expected class instance of value to be extracted
        Returns:
        the value if found. Returns null if there was any error of if there was no value stored for the key.

      • addKey

        public boolean addKey(String key,
             boolean permanent,
             SyncEventListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: SyncClient
        Store new key in key set.
        Specified by:
        addKey in interface SyncClient
        Parameters:
        key - The key to be saved in key set. It is recommended to use constructKey to create key object.
        permanent - true if the value should be persisted after end of session.
        listener - Listener object that asynchronously notifies the events related to the key.
        Returns:
        true if operation was successful.
